title: Monthly exchange rate of USD to GBP 2017 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows USD GBP exchange rate for 25 number of Months.
The USD GBP exchange rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Aug 19 and lowest at Month Mar 18.
The maximum Month Aug 19 has got 1.15 times higher USD GBP exchange rate than the minimum Month Mar 18.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and USD GBP exchange rate in the y axis.
Month Aug 19 has the highest USD GBP exchange rate and Mar 18 has the lowest USD GBP exchange rate.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows USD GBP exchange rate for 25 number of Months.
The USD GBP exchange rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Aug 19 and lowest at Month Mar 18.
The maximum Month Aug 19 has got 1.15 times higher USD GBP exchange rate than the minimum Month Mar 18.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and USD GBP exchange rate in the y axis.
Month Aug 19 has the highest USD GBP exchange rate and Mar 18 has the lowest USD GBP exchange rate.
The second highest USD GBP exchange rate is appeared to be the Month Jul 19.
There is a difference of 0.11 between the maximum Month Aug 19 and minimum Month Mar 18.
USD GBP exchange rate at Month Aug 19 is 0.82 , second place is Jul 19 at 0.82, and thirdly is Oct 18 at 0.79.
Overall USD GBP exchange rate has lowered over the Months.
Similar USD GBP exchange rate is found in Month Jan 19, Sep 18, Jul 18, Jun 18, and Oct 17.
The Month Aug 19 has 1.07 times more USD GBP exchange rate than average.
The USD GBP exchange rate is 19.07 if we add up values of all Months.
